parameters.name: index_name
parameters.description: (string) Name of the vector index where data is to be deleted. Must be a Direct Vector Access Index.

primary_keys.description: List of primary keys for the data to be deleted.

requestBody.description: Data to be deleted from the vector index.

200.description: Response indicating the result of the delete operation.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Handles the deletion of data from a specified vector index.
